index.1.mailing_list: Join our mailing list to get the latest updates on JARVIS activities, token generation event, and platform release.
index.2.explanation: JARVIS, the very first decentralized AI platform backed by blockchain technology, gives AI power back to the people. With JARVIS, we can collectively explore and build decentralized cognitive intelligence and define boundaries and rules for artificial general intelligence that is ethical, moral and beneficial for the mankind.
index.3.most_ai_development: Most AI development today is made by large companies that are immensely resourceful. JARVIS lowers the entry barrier for all machine learning developers, knowledge curators, app developers, and computation providers, bringing the value of AI to more people in more ways.
index.3.ai_combining: Combining AI with blockchain technology, JARVIS creates a viable decentralized AI marketplace for different types of stakeholders.
index.4.computation_power: Rent out computation power to complete AI training, AI serving, and other jobs on JARVIS.
index.4.collect_maintain: Collect and maintain valuable data and/or knowledge to ensure their availability on JARVIS.
index.4.develop_data_analytics: Develop computer programs that continue to refine their performances through data analytics to find insights.
index.4.app_developers: Adopt turn-key AI solutions on JARVIS to create applications that deliver values to end-users.
index.5.jarvis_introduction: JARVIS is introducing JAR as the utility token that facilitates the value exchange processes, such as training AI models, providing blockchain consensus, renting GPU resources, and much more. JAR is imperative to JARVIS’ economic model and crucial help define how JARVIS stakeholders will create, distribute, and consume AI models and curated knowledges.
index.6.build_anything: With JARVIS, you can build anything from AI-powered user interface to scalable video stream analytic and even medical diagnosis system with strong guarantee of patient’s data privacy. The potential applications on JARVIS are countless. The only limit is your imagination.
index.6.ai_technologies: In addition to voice assistant and pattern recognition, many upcoming AI-powered technologies are expected to process videos as well.
index.6.train_iot_models: Instead of training models from scratch, unlocked the true potential of IoTs from day one by leveraging turn-key AI solutions on JARVIS.
index.6.medicinal_applications: Empower radiologists with AI application to receive faster, and more accurate diagnostics while keeping patient privacy.
index.6.user_interface: Robust and intelligent User Interphase that accelerate the innovation and value creation of future technology applications.
index.7.team_blurb: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur nec diam id metus porttitor pretium. Vestibulum in viverra erat.
deepdive.1.mine_intelligence: JARVIS is a blockchain network for Mining Intelligence and running Intelligent Contracts.
deepdive.1.proof_of_intelligence: Instead of wasting valuable computing power on consensus through Proof-of-Work (PoW), computation providers are solving valuable AI jobs through what we call Proof-of-Intelligence (POI).
deepdive.1.intelligent_contract: Intelligent Contract - JARVIS creates Intelligence Contract, which addresses the limitation of EVM Smart Contract and enables the development of truly smart applications.
deepdive.2.big_hurdles: Tackle the Biggest Hurdles in AI to achieve Artificial General Intelligence (AGI).
deepdive.2.patter_recognition: Pattern recognition and common sense, which human can learn easily thanks to our brain (both the right and the left), is difficult for machine to grasp. JARVIS aims to change the status quo.
deepdive.2.unified_model_zoo: Designed to recognize and perceive external objects and phenomena, Unified Model Zoo would be the most comprehensive collection of neural network models for any pattern recognition task. It enables the JARVIS network to observe and explore the physical world while more high-quality models are trained and added to Unified Model Zoo.
deepdive.2.common_sense_graph: Created for reasoning and understanding. The conceptual ideas and relationships are extracted from the massive inputs to construct a knowledge graph to express the human though. Common Sense Graph encapsulates basic human knowledge represented as a combination of linguistic corpus and fuzzy logic rules.
deepdive.3.stark_thor: Stark Virtual Machine and THOR Programming Language, Pluggable Consensus Engine
deepdive.3.stark_machine: is the next generation blockchain VM that will power JARVIS. Due to its design, Ethereum VM does not have the scalability and computing capability to run smart applications.
deepdive.3.pce: JARVIS adopt a new "multi-consensus" design which allows different consensus mechanisms (e.g. DPos, DAG, and VRF) to be used for different types of replicated state multiple consensus engines via Start VM.
deepdive.3.intuitive_development: provides a simple, clean, and intuitive development environment for any developer who wants to create Intelligent Contract in the JARVIS network.
governance.1.great_power: Greater Power Comes with Greater Responsibility
governance.1.decentralization: JARVIS the very first decentralized AI platform combined with blockchain technology, to give AI power back to the people for a better future.Together with blockchain based technology, we can collectively explore and build nextgen AI models across the globe in a fully decentralized way.
